mutants.code:
from typing import List, Dict

def get_keys_sorted_by_value_length(my_dict: Dict) -> List[str]:
    sorted_keys = sorted(my_dict.keys(), key=lambda x: len(str(my_dict[x])), reverse=False)
    return sorted_keys
